อุตสาหกรรมคริปโตของรัสเซียจะรวมตัวกันที่ VIII Crypto Summit!

The Russian crypto industry will unite at the VIII Crypto Summit!

21m ago//AMBCrypto Team
general
AI

Summary

TH

อุตสาหกรรมคริปโตในรัสเซียจะรวมตัวกันที่งาน Crypto Summit ครั้งที่ 8 ในวันที่ 25-26 มีนาคม 2026 ณ MTS Live Hall โดยจะรวมบริษัทชั้นนำ, แพลตฟอร์มการซื้อขาย, นักลงทุน และผู้กำกับดูแลกิจการทั้งหมดเข้าด้วยกัน งานนี้จัดขึ้นในช่วงที่ตลาดคริปโตของรัสเซียกำลังเปลี่ยนจากสถานะ "การทดลอง" มาสู่โครงสร้างพื้นฐานที่สมบูรณ์พร้อมใช้งาน งานสุดยอดนี้จะเน้นที่หัวข้อสำคัญรวมถึงสถาปัตยกรรมกฎระเบียบใหม่, การบูรณาการ AI เข้ากับเศรษฐกิจ Web3, การทำโทเค็นสินทรัพย์ในโลกแท้จริง และกลยุทธ์สำหรับบริษัทที่รอดชีวิตจากความปั่นป่วนของตลาดในปี 2024-2025

EN

The Russian crypto industry will gather at the VIII Crypto Summit on March 25-26, 2026, at MTS Live Hall, bringing together leading companies, exchanges, investors, and regulators. This event comes as the Russian crypto market transitions from an "experimental" state to a fully-fledged infrastructure. The summit will focus on critical topics including new regulatory architecture, Web3 economy integration with AI, real-world asset tokenization, and strategies for companies navigating post-2024-2025 market turbulence.

Key Points

  • The VIII Crypto Summit will be held on March 25-26, 2026, in Russia, bringing together industry leaders, exchanges, investors, and regulators
  • The Russian crypto market is transitioning from an "experimental" phase to a fully-fledged infrastructure
  • Key topics include new regulatory frameworks, AI integration with Web3, real-world asset tokenization, and post-2024-2025 turbulence strategies

Article

contributor Posted: February 6, 2026 Leading companies, exchanges, investors, and regulators will gather at one venue to set the course for market development in 2026. 2026 begins at a point when the Russian crypto market is finally emerging from its “experimental” state and transforming into a fully-fledged infrastructure. Exchanges are adapting to new requirements, mining is experiencing another technological breakthrough, Web3 teams are growing faster than ever, and government agencies are talking about digital assets with increasing frequency. This is why the VIII Crypto Summit is becoming an event that could determine the rules of the game for the coming year. On March 25-26, the teams driving the market forward—those who create tools, make decisions, build infrastructure, and solve dozens of real-world problems—will gather at MTS Live Hall. This year, the Crypto Summit will focus not only on familiar topics, but also on issues that have been discussed behind the scenes until now: What will the new regulatory architecture be? What will happen to the Web3 economy after the integration of AI? Is a new wave of real-world asset tokenization expected in 2026? And most importantly, what are the companies that survived the turbulence of 2024–2025 preparing for? This won’t just be a discussion. There will be a reconciliation of strategies between the government, industry, infrastructure, and business. The VIII Crypto Summit will be attended by exchange owners, integrators, miners, investors, Web3 teams, infrastructure projects, and research centers—those who don’t just “follow the crypto industry,” but shape it. 2026 promises to be a turning point for the crypto industry. And the place where this will become clear is the VIII Crypto Summit. The general partner will be the MEXC exchange. The title partner will be ALGORITM Stay up-to-date on the official channel: @cryptosummit_ru Buy a ticket – Use promo code AMBCRYPTO to get a 10% discount.
